secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'W'.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Watermelon" and "Wagon".
I would like to bring "Whale" to the game. Does it fit the rule?
I would like to bring "Windmill" to the game. Does it fit the rule?
I would like to bring "Window" to the game. Does it fit the rule?

Based on the pattern of the items that fit the rule, it seems that all the items start with the letter "W." To test this hypothesis, I'll make a new guess:

Player: I would like to bring "Walrus" to the game. Does it fit the rule?
Player: I would like to bring "Wizard" to the game. Does it fit the rule?
I would like to bring "Wolf" to the game. Does it fit the rule?

The rule appears to be that all the items must start with the letter "W." All examples and attempts that fit the rule begin with this letter, so the best guess is that the secret rule is: Items you can bring must start with "W."
